Package org.apache.ignite.cache.store.jdbc

Interface JdbcTypesTransformer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    JdbcTypesDefaultTransformer
    public interface JdbcTypesTransformer
extends Serializable
    API for implementing custom mapping logic for loaded from store data.

      static List<Integer> NUMERIC_TYPES
      Numeric types.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Object getColumnValue​(ResultSet rs, int colIdx, Class<?> type)
      Retrieves the value of the designated column in the current row of this ResultSet object and will convert to the requested Java data type.

    • Field Detail

      • NUMERIC_TYPES

        static final List<Integer> NUMERIC_TYPES
        Numeric types.

    • Method Detail

      • getColumnValue

        Object getColumnValue​(ResultSet rs,
                      int colIdx,
                      Class<?> type)
               throws SQLException
        Retrieves the value of the designated column in the current row of this ResultSet object and will convert to the requested Java data type.
        Parameters:
        rs - Result set.
        colIdx - Column index in result set.
        type - Class representing the Java data type to convert the designated column to.
        Returns:
        Value in column.
        Throws:
        SQLException - If a database access error occurs or this method is called.
